title: AdExtraction
description: Simple extraction schema for basic LLM. All fields are direct copy or keyword spotting. No reasoning.

title.extraction_prompt: Copy the job title exactly as written

budget_low.extraction_prompt: What is the lowest price number mentioned? Write just the number.

budget_high.extraction_prompt: What is the highest price number mentioned? Write just the number.

currency.extraction_prompt: What currency is mentioned? Examples: USD, INR, GBP, EUR, AUD

is_hourly.extraction_prompt: Does the ad mention 'per hour' or 'hourly'? Yes or No.

is_fixed.extraction_prompt: Does the ad mention 'fixed price' or 'fixed bid' or 'paid on delivery'? Yes or No.

deadline_text.extraction_prompt: Copy any text about deadlines or time limits

hours_mentioned.extraction_prompt: List any mentions of hours, like '2-3 hours' or '25-40 hours'

requirements.extraction_prompt: List each requirement or task bullet point, one per line

deliverables.extraction_prompt: List what the client wants delivered or created

files_mentioned.extraction_prompt: List any file types mentioned: PDF, Excel, CSV, Word, SQL, JSON, TXT, etc.

tools_mentioned.extraction_prompt: List any software or tools mentioned: Excel, Google Sheets, VBA, Python, MySQL, etc.

client_will_provide.extraction_prompt: List anything the client says they will provide or send

not_included.extraction_prompt: List anything marked as 'out of scope' or 'not included'

words_simple.extraction_prompt: Does the ad contain words like 'simple', 'easy', 'quick', 'basic', or 'straightforward'? Yes or No.

words_complex.extraction_prompt: Does the ad contain words like 'complex', 'advanced', 'expert', or 'sophisticated'? Yes or No.

words_urgent.extraction_prompt: Does the ad contain words like 'urgent', 'ASAP', 'rush', or 'immediately'? Yes or No.

words_ongoing.extraction_prompt: Does the ad contain words like 'ongoing', 'recurring', 'daily', 'weekly', or 'long-term'? Yes or No.

has_api.extraction_prompt: Does the ad mention 'API' or 'APIs'? Yes or No.

has_database.extraction_prompt: Does the ad mention 'database', 'SQL', 'MySQL', or 'PostgreSQL'? Yes or No.

has_web.extraction_prompt: Does the ad mention 'HTML', 'website', 'web page', or 'interface'? Yes or No.

has_automation.extraction_prompt: Does the ad mention 'automate', 'automation', 'VBA', or 'macro'? Yes or No.

experience_level.extraction_prompt: If the ad states an experience level (Entry, Intermediate, Expert), copy it. Otherwise write 'not stated'.
